Text: Josiah Henson:  Henson's autobiography, "The Life of Josiah Henson, Formerly a Slave, Now an Inhabitant of Canada, as Narrated by Himself" (1849), is believed to have inspired the title character of Harriet Beecher Stowe's "Uncle Tom's Cabin" (1852).
